apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a couple with a heart on Apple devices features two figures rendered in a warm, medium-light skin tone, radiating affection through their closeness and the prominent, glossy heart hovering between them. Apple’s design language imbues the figures with soft rounded edges and a gentle, loving gaze, while the heart itself shines with realistic lighting, symbolizing deep connection and romantic love. It’s a heartfelt way to express partnership, commitment, or profound adoration in digital communication.
